ManifestServiceworker.summary: The serviceworker member specifies a serviceworker that is Just-In-Time (JIT)-installed and registered to run a web-based payment app providing a payment mechanism for a specified payment method in a merchant website. See {{domxref("Payment Handler API", "Payment Handler API", "", "nocode")}} for more details.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("Service Worker API", "Service Worker API", "", "nocode")}}
-{{domxref("Payment Handler API", "Payment Handler API", "", "nocode")}}
-Web-based payment apps overview
-Setting up a payment method
-Life of a payment transaction
-Using the Payment Request API
-Payment processing concepts
